plot: A melodrama of a wealthy Los Angeles family - and the journey each one begins after a death in the family. The title of the film refers not only to the loss of life and love, but to a phrase used by most Angelenos while talking on cellular phones; I'm Losing You... &"I'm Losing You&" follows the path of each character after a cataclysmic event: the death of Bertie's young daughter Tiffany, in an &"accident&". The family comes closer together in the wake of such an event, seeking to recover from a blow that has driven each one to near madness.   Written by  by CMA Music/cc (Lions Gate)
title: Te estoy perdiendo
